name: Cookie Cutter Challenge
description:
Our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021, themed "Joined Together".

This puzzle game lets you slice and dice, then reassemble (join together) cookies. Try to make the requested cookie, and challenge yourself to do so in the least amount of cuts.

How does this game fit the theme ? This game is all about slicing cookies and joining them together again in the right way.
